Package besLib.pa

Class BesPA_UART

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.advantest.itee.tmapi.protocolaccess.ProtocolInterfaceBase
      • besLib.pa.BesPA_UART
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.advantest.itee.tmapi.protocolaccess.IProtocolInterfaceBase
    public class BesPA_UART
extends com.advantest.itee.tmapi.protocolaccess.ProtocolInterfaceBase
    This class is used to write data to BES chip based on UART protocol (only for UART write !!!)
    Version:
    V1.0
    Author:
    wenju.sun, Weng Yongxin
